options.content:
AWS CloudWatch Lambda documentation
Installed from Grafana.net dashboards

targets.expression:
filter msg = "Indexing CAR complete" 
 | stats avg(duration) by bin(1m)

filter msg = "Indexing CAR complete" 
 | stats avg(source.contentLength) by bin(1m)

filter msg = "Indexing CAR complete" 
 | stats avg(blocks) by bin(1m)

filter ipfs_provider_component = "indexer-lambda" 
 | stats avg(`metrics.dynamo-batch-inserts-durations.mean`) by bin(1m)

filter ipfs_provider_component = "indexer-lambda" 
 | stats avg(`metrics.dynamo-creates-durations.mean`) by bin(1m)

filter ipfs_provider_component = "indexer-lambda" 
 | stats sum(`metrics.dynamo-batch-inserts-count`) by bin(1m)

filter ipfs_provider_component = "indexer-lambda" 
 | stats sum(`metrics.dynamo-creates-count`) by bin(1m)

filter ipfs_provider_component = "indexer-lambda" 
 | stats sum(`metrics.dynamo-creates-count`) by bin(1m)

filter ipfs_provider_component = "indexer-lambda" 
 | stats sum(`metrics.dynamo-creates-durations.sum`) by bin(1m)

filter ipfs_provider_component = "indexer-lambda" 
 | stats avg(`metrics.s3-fetchs-durations.mean`) by bin(1m)

filter ipfs_provider_component = "indexer-lambda" 
 | stats sum(`metrics.s3-fetchs-durations.count`) by bin(1m)

filter ipfs_provider_component = "indexer-lambda" 
 | stats avg(`metrics.sqs-publishes-batch-durations.mean`) by bin(1m)

filter ipfs_provider_component = "indexer-lambda" 
 | stats avg(`metrics.sqs-publishes-durations.mean`) by bin(1m)

filter ipfs_provider_component = "indexer-lambda" 
 | stats sum(`metrics.sqs-publishes-batch-durations.count`) by bin(1m)

filter ipfs_provider_component = "indexer-lambda" 
 | stats sum(`metrics.sqs-publishes-durations.count`) by bin(1m)

filter msg = "Cannot index the CAR file"
| stats count(*) as `Cannot index the CAR file` by bin(1m)

filter msg = "Cannot write batch items to DynamoDB table"
| stats count(*) as `Cannot write batch items to DynamoDB table` by bin(1m)

filter msg = "Error writing blocks"
| stats count(*) as `Error writing blocks` by bin(1m)

filter msg = "Cannot send command to DynamoDB after 3 attempts"
| stats count(*) as `Cannot send command to DynamoDB after 3 attempts` by bin(1m)

filter msg = "Error queuing block tasks"
| stats count(*) as `Error queuing block tasks` by bin(1m)

filter msg = "Cannot insert item into DynamoDB"
| stats count(*) as `Cannot insert item into DynamoDB` by bin(1m)

filter msg = "Cannot update item in DynamoDB table cars"
| stats count(*) as `Cannot update item in DynamoDB table cars` by bin(1m)

filter msg = "Cannot insert item into DynamoDB table blocks"
| stats count(*) as `Cannot insert item into DynamoDB table blocks` by bin(1m)

filter msg like "Cannot open file S3 URL s3:"
| stats count(*) as `Cannot open file S3 URL s3:` by bin(1m)

fields error, msg, @message
| filter msg !=	"Cannot send command to DynamoDB after 3 attempts" and 
msg !=	"Cannot index the CAR file"and
msg !=	"Cannot write batch items to DynamoDB table" and
msg !=	"Error writing blocks" and
msg !=	"Error queuing block tasks" and
msg !=	"Cannot insert item into DynamoDB" and
@type != "END" and @type != "START" and @type != "REPORT" and msg != "Dumping metrics ..." and msg != "Indexing CAR complete"

fields @message
| filter @type != "END" and @type != "START" and @type != "REPORT" and msg != "Dumping metrics ..."
and ipfs_provider_component != "indexer-lambda"
and (@message like "ERROR" or @message like "error" or @message like "Error") and @message not like "Indexing CAR complete" and @message not like "sent sns message on topic"

filter ipfs_provider_component = "publisher-advertisement-lambda" 
 | stats avg(`metrics.http-indexer-announcements-durations.mean`) by bin(1m)

filter ipfs_provider_component = "publisher-advertisement-lambda" 
 | stats avg(`metrics.http-head-cid-fetchs-durations.mean`) by bin(1m)

filter ipfs_provider_component = "publisher-advertisement-lambda"
 | stats sum(`metrics.http-indexer-announcements-durations.count`) by bin(1m)

filter ipfs_provider_component = "publisher-advertisement-lambda"
 | stats sum(`metrics.http-head-cid-fetchs-durations.count`) by bin(1m)

filter ipfs_provider_component = "publisher-advertisement-lambda" 
 | stats avg(`metrics.s3-uploads-durations.mean`) by bin(1m)

filter ipfs_provider_component = "publisher-advertisement-lambda" 
 | stats avg(`metrics.s3-fetchs-durations.mean`) by bin(1m)

filter ipfs_provider_component = "publisher-advertisement-lambda"
 | stats sum(`metrics.s3-uploads-durations.count`) by bin(1m)

filter ipfs_provider_component = "publisher-advertisement-lambda"
 | stats sum(`metrics.s3-fetchs-durations.count`) by bin(1m)

filter msg = "notifyIndexer at https://cid.contact/ingest/announce"
| stats count(*) as `notifyIndexer at https://cid.contact/ingest/announce` by bin(1m)

filter msg = "Downloading PeerId from s3://ipfs-peer-bitswap-config/peerId.json"
| stats count(*) as `Downloading PeerId from s3://ipfs-peer-bitswap-config/peerId.json` by bin(1m)

fields @message
| filter @type != "END" and @type != "START" and @type != "REPORT"
and ipfs_provider_component != "publisher-advertisement-lambda"
and (@message like "ERROR" or @message like "error" or @message like "Error" or @message like "failed" or @message like "Failed")

filter @type != "END" and @type != "START" and @type != "REPORT"
and ipfs_provider_component != "publisher-advertisement-lambda"
and (@message like "ERROR" or @message like "error" or @message like "Error" or @message like "Failed"  or @message like "failed") and @message not like "Announcing to the indexer node failed"
| stats count(*) as `Other errors` by bin(1m)

filter @message like "Announcing to the indexer node failed"
| stats count(*) as `Announcing to the indexer node failed` by bin(1m)

fields error, msg
| filter msg !=	"Cannot send command to DynamoDB after 3 attempts" and 
msg !=	"Cannot index the CAR file"and
msg !=	"Cannot write batch items to DynamoDB table" and
msg !=	"Error writing blocks" and
msg !=	"Error queuing block tasks" and
msg !=	"Cannot insert item into DynamoDB"

filter ipfs_provider_component = "publisher-content-lambda" 
 | stats avg(`metrics.s3-uploads-durations.mean`) by bin(1m)

filter ipfs_provider_component = "publisher-content-lambda"
 | stats sum(`metrics.s3-uploads-durations.count`) by bin(1m)

filter ipfs_provider_component = "publisher-content-lambda"
 | stats sum(`metrics.s3-uploads-count`) by bin(1m)

filter ipfs_provider_component = "publisher-content-lambda" 
 | stats avg(`metrics.sqs-publishes-durations.mean`) by bin(1m)

filter ipfs_provider_component = "publisher-content-lambda"
 | stats sum(`metrics.sqs-publishes-durations.count`) by bin(1m)
stats sum(records) as `Published records` by bin(1m)
stats sum(elapsed) as `Elapsed` by bin(1m)

fields @message
| filter @type != "END" and @type != "START" and @type != "REPORT"
and ipfs_provider_component != "publisher-content-lambda"
and (@message like "ERROR" or @message like "error" or @message like "Error")
